title: Gary Zukav On Temptation
description: From a January 29, 2001 Oprah Winfrey Show: Gary Zukav shares the spiritual power necessary to overcome temptation and addiction. We hear from various audience members about their struggles. Gary sees temptation as the energy through which your soul is given the gracious opportunity to have a dry run at a life lesson.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
